column4: evening all!  anyone here know anything about installing java sdk on ubuntu (powerpc)
Anyone have any experience installing java sdk on a ppc?
You need tro register at ibm, then you can download.
You're after " IBM SDK for 32-bit iSeries/pSeries" right?
I'm fetching it; 64MB, so takes a while...
Thanks!  What is the best way for me to get it from you?
I'll be putting it on a website; so browser/wget/whatever.
